https://tmrev.io/movie/277095-Cross Road 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kZjV5KgkTF3iRELAhneJdIoAuiJ.jpg High school students Miho and Shouta are preparing for college entrance examinations. Miho comes from an island without even one cram school, while Shouta lives in Tokyo and works a part-time job. Both are striving to pass exams so they can enter college. The pair enroll in Z-Kai's correspondence education courses, and their lives cross before they realize it. Cross Road
